title: Lucy Frazer – 2023 Speech at the Onward Think Tank
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Lucy Frazer, the Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport, on 19 July 2023.
content:
Thank you Onward for hosting today’s event
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
